name: João no Pati
description:
Pati is a valley in the heart of Chapada Diamantina, a huge Brazilian national park.

João is my best friend.

“João no Pati” was created after crossing on foot this emblematic place.


Davi Fonseca (composition, arrangement, piano, keyboard and voice)
Alexandre Andrés (c flute)
Alexandre Silva (clarinet)
Camila Rocha (eletric bass)
Natália Mitre (berimbau and vibraphone)
Yuri Vellasco (pandeiro, drums and tabla)
Felipe Vilas Boas (guitar)


choir: Sofia Cupertino, Raquel Liboredo, Iaiá Drumond, Valéria Braga e Irene Bertachini.
